data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Al Iskandariyah.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Iskandariyah, Egypt
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Al Iskandariyah who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 108 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Al Iskandariyah, Egypt.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Al Iskandariyah do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Al Iskandariyah.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Berber, Siwa people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, the believers in the state of Al Iskandariyah, Egypt need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 169,537 believers in the state of Al Iskandariyah with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Al Iskandariyah, Egypt.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Al Iskandariyah
location.people_groups_list: Bedouin, Levantine, Chechen, South Asian, general, Berber, Siwa, Arab, Arabic Gulf Spoken
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bedouin, Levantine (124,000), Chechen (6,000), South Asian, general (4,900), Berber, Siwa (23,000), Arab, Arabic Gulf Spoken (1,695,000)
